subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Samardzija gave up one hit over eight innings and Alfonso Soriano hit two run-scoring doubles as the Chicago Cubs cooled off the Pirates, 2-0, at Pittsburgh on Monday night.
snippet: Jeff Samardzija gave up one hit over eight innings and Alfonso Soriano hit two run-scoring doubles as the Chicago Cubs cooled off the Pirates, 2-0, at Pittsburgh on Monday night.
